name: FarmSaviour
description:
Our team "Sony" would like to introduce our game called "FarmSaviour". This game is design by  

Apexa Rathod, 

Priya, 

Supriya Tarte, 

Qingzhuo Shi. 

This game includes shooting and trying to save the farm. Also, this game focuses on the player's(Farmer's) health during keeping the farm safe.

The premise

You are a farmer, evil enemies are going to hurt your farm!! And also can rob you! Get your weapon and defeat these evils. You are going to complete each level's mission to get to next level and win this game with the help of extra health.

Core Mechanism:

This game follows ”W,A,S,D to control movement. Mouse to control fire.” shooting and touching by enemies will hurt the player. Once the health bar comes to zero, player will die. "Keep yourself alive, and kill enemies!" Meantime, in each level player have been set to different mission. By completing missions in each level, the player can go to next level, and finally win the game.
